    • replaceColorChar

      public static String replaceColorChar(String s)
      Replace chat color character '§' with 'invalid input: '&'' This is an alternative method to ChatColor.stripColor(String) But does not strip the color code.
      Parameters:
      s - string to replace chat color character of.
      Returns:
      String with replaced chat color character
